posts.post_title: Looking for Paul Hines Old Judge cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Thomas Hines
I see that there ssems to be a bit of activity lately with OJ's so I thought I might try again to locate some Paul Hines cards. I am interested in any pose and copyright including the 2 player pose with Farrell tagging Paul. I am not particular on graded or raw. Thank you.

Tom Hines
